title: Having trouble verifying email, need this to send a ticket
body:
So right now I'm not resceiving verification emails to my email account and need to verify my email to send a ticket...

Not sure why its doing this since i beleive i've done this before and sent in a ticket before.

Plz help

replies.body: I went ahead and sent out another verification email, so make sure to check your spam folders for it just in case it's getting filtered out. If you still aren't able to find that email, feel free to shoot us another [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our account agents should be able to get that straightened out.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=jVc0VUBE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-24T02:51:54.875+0000)
>
> I went ahead and sent out another verification email, so make sure to check your spam folders for it just in case it's getting filtered out. If you still aren't able to find that email, feel free to shoot us another [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our account agents should be able to get that straightened out.

I can't send in a ticket because it says "must be logged in to send ticket".  yet i can't loggin unless i'm verified, which doesn't make sense because i've been able to send in tickets before.

I also looked in my spam folder and it hasn't given me anything.  this is really weird
Make sure that you're sending that ticket with the option "I need help recovering my account" picked. That will let you send us a ticket without being signed in.
